content: knitted hipster hat for men in drops flora the piece is worked in rib see 219-1 georgetown vest 1 pattern here drops design pattern no fl-055 yarn group a **sizes** s/m - m/l - l/xl fits head size approx 54/56 - 56/58 - 58/60 cm height with double fold-up approx 25-26-27 cm **materials** drops flora from garnstudio 100-100-100 g colour 10 indigo **knitting gauge ** 26 stitches in width and 32 row in height with stocking stitch = 10 x 10 cm needles drops double pointed needles size 2 5 mm drops circular needle size 2 5 mm length 40 cm needle size is only a guide if you get too many stitches on 10 cm change to a larger needle size if you get too few stitches on 10 cm change to a smaller needle size 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/219-1-georgetown-vest
